list.abs: sentences such as “ he struck me as a street-wise hombre who clearly knew his business ” ( his description of a CIA operative ) work better in an army cookhouse than on a published page .比如，他在描写一位中情局特工时，就这样写道：“他打我时，俨然就是在街上混了很久的混混，非常清楚自己在干什么。”像这种话，最好还是在军队的
